ZITADEL - Identity infrastructure, simplified forÂ you.
The authorization Gem for Ruby on Rails.
Doorkeeper is an OAuth 2 provider for Ruby on Rails / Grape.

The most scalable and customizable permission server on the market. Fix your slow or broken permission system with Google's proven "Zanzibar" approach. Supports ACL, RBAC, and more. Written in Go, cloud native, headless, API-first. Available as a service on Ory Network and for self-hosters.
A high performance and flexible authorization/permission engine built for developers and inspired by Google Zanzibar
Easy integration with OAuth 2.0 service providers.
A generic, spec-compliant, thorough implementation of the OAuth request-signing logic
Security engine for Java (authentication, authorization, multi frameworks): OAuth, CAS, SAML, OpenID Connect, LDAP, JWT...
Jwt.Net, a JWT (JSON Web Token) implementation for .NET
ðŸ‘¤ Identity and Access Management knowledge for cloud platforms
Awesome Django authorization, without the database
An authorization library that supports access control models like ACL, RBAC, ABAC in .NET (C#)

*CURRENTLY UNMAINTAINED*. Authority helps you authorize actions in your Rails app. It's ORM-neutral and has very little fancy syntax; just group your models under one or more Authorizer classes and write plain Ruby methods on them.
Simple yet powerful authorization / authentication client library for Python web applications.

OpenAM is an open-source access management solution for identity authentication, authorization, and federation. It provides single sign-on, adaptive authentication, and centralized policy control, enabling secure access to web, mobile, and cloud applications
Security library for Play framework 2 in Java and Scala: OAuth, CAS, SAML, OpenID Connect, LDAP, JWT...
Library for impersonating users during development leveraging ASP.NET Identity.
Goiabada is an OAuth2 / OpenID Connect server written in Go.

OpenIG is an open-source identity gateway (reverse-proxy) that secures, routes, and manages web traffic. It enables authentication, access control, and integration with identity providers, delivering single sign-on and API security for web and cloud applications.
Flexible OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0 server-side implementation for modern ASP.NET projects

OpenID Connect, the authentication protocol and identity layer on top of OAuth 2.0 used in many SSO and adopted in many social logins (Apple, Facebook, Google, ...etc). Find this curated list of providers, services, libraries, and resources to adopt it and know more about existing specs.
